Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.) ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+25 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Ninja Tabi
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Armor UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks. UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +25 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes.

Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 10% of the damage dealt. Scoring a Kill or Assist extends the duration of this Flask by 30 seconds.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Wrath
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Attack Damage and heals you when dealing physical damage.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +25 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes. Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 10% of the damage dealt. Scoring a Kill or Assist extends the duration of this Flask by 30 seconds. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes.

Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Iron
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily reduces the power of enemy crowd control effects. Leaves a trail for allies to follow.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes. Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+75 Attack Damage
+100% Base Health Regen
+12% Life Steal

Passive: Life Steal applies to damage dealt by this item.
UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage).
UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Ravenous Hydra (Melee Only)
Endgame Items.plaintext: Melee attacks hit nearby enemies, dealing damage and restoring Health
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +75 Attack Damage +100% Base Health Regen +12% Life Steal Passive: Life Steal applies to damage dealt by this item. UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage). UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+40 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: Physical damage ignores 35% of the target's Armor (applies before Armor Penetration).
Endgame Items.name: Last Whisper
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: Physical damage ignores 35% of the target's Armor (applies before Armor Penetration).

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+40 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: The Black Cleaver
Endgame Items.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +40 Attack Damage +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%). UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Life Steal
UNIQUE Passive: Your basic attacks can now overheal you. Excess life is stored as a shield that can block 50-350 damage, based on champion level.

This shield decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.
Endgame Items.name: The Bloodthirster
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants Attack Damage, Life Steal and Life Steal now overheals
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: +20% Life Steal UNIQUE Passive: Your basic attacks can now overheal you. Excess life is stored as a shield that can block 50-350 damage, based on champion level. This shield decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

Endgame Items.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+15% Critical Strike Chance
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration
UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).

(Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)
Endgame Items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to greatly increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Attack Damage +15% Critical Strike Chance +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown). (Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)

Endgame Items.description:
+10 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: Grants +5 Attack Damage per stack and 5 stacks upon first purchase. Grants 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist (max 20 stacks). Half of the stacks are lost upon death. At 20 stacks, grants +20% bonus Attack Speed.
Endgame Items.name: Sword of the Occult
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants Attack Damage for kills and assists
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +10 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: Grants +5 Attack Damage per stack and 5 stacks upon first purchase. Grants 2 stacks for a kill or 1 stack for an assist (max 20 stacks). Half of the stacks are lost upon death. At 20 stacks, grants +20% bonus Attack Speed.

Endgame Items.description:
+60 Attack Damage
+40 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive: Grants +1 Attack Damage for every 2% of missing Health, up to a maximum of 35 Attack Damage.
UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs 400 magic damage for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Maw of Malmortius
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants bonus Attack Damage when Health is low
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +60 Attack Damage +40 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive: Grants +1 Attack Damage for every 2% of missing Health, up to a maximum of 35 Attack Damage. UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs 400 magic damage for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Stalker's Blade
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Skirmisher's Sabre
Jungle Items.plaintext: Lets your Smite mark Champions, giving you combat power against them.
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
Starting Items.name: Health Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 5 at one time. Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.

Starting Items.description:
Can only carry 2 Vision Wards in inventory.

Click to Consume: Places a visible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area until killed. Limit 1 Vision Ward on the map per player.

(Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
Starting Items.name: Vision Ward
Starting Items.plaintext: Use to temporarily provide vision and stealth detection in an area
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Can only carry 2 Vision Wards in inventory. Click to Consume: Places a visible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area until killed. Limit 1 Vision Ward on the map per player. (Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
